com.hp.autonomy.frontend.reports.powerpoint

Class PowerPointServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hp.autonomy.frontend.reports.powerpoint.PowerPointServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PowerPointService

    public class PowerPointServiceImpl
extends Object
implements PowerPointService
    Default implementation of PowerPointService.
    See Also:
    README.md for examples and usage instructions.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PowerPointServiceImpl()
      Constructor which uses the default template and default settings, which don't have any logos or margins reserved.
      PowerPointServiceImpl(TemplateSource pptxTemplate, TemplateSettingsSource pptxSettings)
      Constructor for the PowerPointServiceImpl, allowing you to provide your own template and settings.
      PowerPointServiceImpl(TemplateSource pptxTemplate, TemplateSettingsSource pptxSettings, ImageSource imageSource)
      Constructor for the PowerPointServiceImpl, allowing you to provide your own template and settings.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PowerPointServiceImpl

        public PowerPointServiceImpl(TemplateSource pptxTemplate,
                             TemplateSettingsSource pptxSettings,
                             ImageSource imageSource)
        Constructor for the PowerPointServiceImpl, allowing you to provide your own template and settings.
        Parameters:
        pptxTemplate - what template .pptx file to use.
        pptxSettings - what template settings to use.
        imageSource - what image source to use for converting image identifiers to image data.

      • PowerPointServiceImpl

        public PowerPointServiceImpl(TemplateSource pptxTemplate,
                             TemplateSettingsSource pptxSettings)
        Constructor for the PowerPointServiceImpl, allowing you to provide your own template and settings. This uses the default ImageSource implementation which only allows base64-encoded data URIs as images.
        Parameters:
        pptxTemplate - what template .pptx file to use.
        pptxSettings - what template settings to use.

      • PowerPointServiceImpl

        public PowerPointServiceImpl()
        Constructor which uses the default template and default settings, which don't have any logos or margins reserved. This uses the default ImageSource implementation which only allows base64-encoded data URIs as images.

        Validates the template used to see if it has the correct slides.

      • sunburst

        public org.apache.poi.xslf.usermodel.XMLSlideShow sunburst(SunburstData sunburst)
                                                    throws TemplateLoadException
        Description copied from interface: PowerPointService
        Renders a sunburst as a PowerPoint presentation. Only one level of sunburst is supported for now, since it's actually represented by a doughnut chart (based on the first slide in the template).
        Specified by:
        sunburst in interface PowerPointService
        Parameters:
        sunburst - the data representing the sunburst.
        Returns:
        a PowerPoint presentation with a single slide.
        Throws:
        TemplateLoadException - if the template is invalid.

        Renders a table as a PowerPoint presentation.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        tableData - the data representing the table.
        title - an optional title.
        Returns:

        Throws:

      • list

        public org.apache.poi.xslf.usermodel.XMLSlideShow list(ListData documentList,
                                                       String results,
                                                       String sortBy)
                                                throws TemplateLoadException
        Description copied from interface: PowerPointService
        Renders a list of documents as a PowerPoint presentation, similar to how they're rendered in Find. We only support thumbnail images if they're provided as base64 strings to embed into the document, since the POI API doesn't support links to external images.
        Specified by:
        list in interface PowerPointService
        Parameters:
        documentList - the data containing all the documents
        results - an optional string which will be shown in the top-left.
        sortBy - an optional string which will be shown in the top-right.
        Returns:
        a PowerPoint presentation with the list results paginated over multiple slides.
        Throws:
        TemplateLoadException - if the template is invalid.

      • graph

        public org.apache.poi.xslf.usermodel.XMLSlideShow graph(DategraphData data)
                                                 throws TemplateLoadException
        Description copied from interface: PowerPointService
        Renders a date graph as a PowerPoint presentation. This is drawn based on the xy scatterplot chart (which must be contained in the second slide in the template).
        Specified by:
        graph in interface PowerPointService
        Parameters:
        data - the data representing the graph series to plot.
        Returns:
        a PowerPoint presentation with a single slide.
        Throws:
        TemplateLoadException - if the template is invalid.

      • report

        public org.apache.poi.xslf.usermodel.XMLSlideShow report(ReportData report,
                                                         boolean slidePerVisualizer)
                                                  throws TemplateLoadException
        Description copied from interface: PowerPointService
        Render a composite report consisting of multiple visualizations as a PowerPoint presentation.
        Specified by:
        report in interface PowerPointService
        Parameters:
        report - the data containing a list of visualizations to render.
        slidePerVisualizer - if true, we'll put each visualization on a separate slide.
        Returns:
        a PowerPoint presentation with a single slide.
        Throws:
        TemplateLoadException - if the template is invalid.
